sn36.25:4.1: “‘Imā vedanā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
sn36.25:4.2: ‘Ayaṃ vedanāsamudayo’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe …
sn36.25:4.4: ‘Ayaṃ vedanāsamudayagāminī paṭipadā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe …
sn36.25:4.5: ‘ayaṃ vedanānirodho’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe …
sn36.25:4.6: ‘ayaṃ vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe …
sn36.25:4.7: ‘ayaṃ vedanāya assādo’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu … pe …
sn36.25:4.8: ‘ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu … pe …
sn36.25:4.9: ‘idaṃ kho nissaraṇan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
